pairs.q1_text: A user connects a smartphone to a laptop. Which of the following types of networks has the user created?

pairs.q1_text:
An insurance company wants to implement cloud computing and would like a cloud solution in which the infrastructure is shared with businesses in the same
industry. Which of the following cloud models BEST addresses the company's need?
pairs.q2_text:

industry. Which of the following cloud models BEST addresses the company's need?

pairs.q1_text:
A technician configured a new SOHO router for a small business. The ISP gave the technician an IP address on the router's WAN port. Which of the following
addresses did the technician most likely configure on the router?
pairs.q2_text:

pairs.q1_text: Which of the following would an administrator use to migrate virtual machines from on premises to the cloud?
pairs.q2_text: Which of the following would an administrator use to migrate virtual machines from on premises to the cloud?

pairs.q1_text:
A salesperson is using a weather application on a mobile device. The application appears to be draining the device's battery very quickly. Which of the following is
the BEST action for the salesperson to take in order to view weather forecasts while traveling?
pairs.q2_text:

pairs.q1_text: Several users who share a multifunction printer in an office have reported unintended, thin, vertical lines that cover the entire height of every page printed from the printer. Which of the following steps should a technician complete in order to MOST likely resolve this issue?
pairs.q2_text:

pairs.q1_text: A technician is receiving reports that the entire office sporadically loses network connectivity throughout the day. The technician determines the root cause to be EMI. Which of the following cable mediums would be the MOST cost effective without sacrificing system performance?
pairs.q2_text:

pairs.q1_text: A technician is configuring a new CAD workstation that has four large hard drives. The workstation will be used to edit large, critical files, so the storage configuration should be both fast and redundant. Which of the following RAID levels BEST meets these requirements?
pairs.q2_text:

pairs.q1_text:
A technician is upgrading a legacy wireless router for a home user. After installing the new router and configuring the SSID to be the same, none of the devices will
connect to the network. Which of the following should the technician check NEXT?
pairs.q2_text: A technician is upgrading a legacy wireless router for a home user. After installing the new router and configuring the SSID to be the same, none of the devices will connect to the network. Which of the following should the technician check NEXT?

pairs.q1_text: A Microsoft Windows user is preparing to work in another country and needs to comply with corporate policy for data protection when copying files to portable media. Which of the following solutions would MOST likely satisfy this requirement?
pairs.q2_text:

pairs.q1_text: A field technician has been dispatched to a site with an internet outage. Upon arriving, the technician discovers that the POTS lines are not working as well. Which of the following technologies is the site MOST likely using?

technician consider?

pairs.q1_text: A startup company is outgrowing its current office space and is requiring employees to work remotely. Which of the following should the IT department implement?

pairs.q1_text: A remote user called the help desk to report a notification indicating there is limited or no connectivity. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause of the issue?

pairs.q1_text:
A technician receives several error alerts on a server after an unexpected reboot. A message states that one or more disks are in a degraded state. When the
technician advances to the next error message, it indicates the OS is missing. Which of the following are the MOST likely causes of these errors? (Choose two.)
